attributes.action: Make it illegal for companies to throw away food and waste food.
attributes.background: Every year, a lot of food is wasted and thrown away, but it should be donated to charity, turned into animal feed or compost. This way, it will help the environment and reduce food waste.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure exactly what behaviour you would like made illegal. For example, we aren't sure what you mean by "waste food".

You might like to sign this petition calling for leftover food to be given to charity instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/230559
